titlestmt.author: Collection Description/Finding Aid prepared by Bobby Marlin.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was encoding in EAD scripts by Archon system scripts from a SQL database source on June 27th, 2007.

titlepage.titleproper: University of Houston Self Study Records
titlepage.author: Bobby Marlin

did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Special Collections, University of Houston Libraries

did.unittitle: University of Houston Self Study Records
did.abstract: The University of Houston conducts a self-study in accordance with the requirements of the Commission on Colleges and the National Collegiate Athletic Association. Traditionally they take place over a two year period and involve a broad cross-section of faculty, staff, and administration of the University. These studies are comprehensive and analytical in nature with the goal of identifying both the strengths and weaknesses of the university and to make recommendations to improve the performance of the institution. The materials in this collection are arranged chronologically.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The University of Houston conducts a self-study in accordance with the requirements of the Commission on Colleges and the National Collegiate Athletic Association. Traditionally they take place over a two year period and involve a broad cross-section of faculty, staff, and administration of the University. These studies are comprehensive and analytical in nature with the goal of identifying both the strengths and weaknesses of the university and to make recommendations to improve the performance of the institution.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of Materials
arrangement.p: The materials in this collection are arranged chronologically.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The material in this collection is in the public domain. However, Special Collections owns the physical items in our collections, and all reproduction restrictions apply.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Houston Self Study Records, University of Houston Self-Study Records, Courtesy of Special Collections, University of Houston Libraries.

scopecontent.p: This series consists of materials related to the University of Houston Self-Study done during the 1960s. It contains 59 folders and is arranged in alphabetical order with the original folder titles.

did.unittitle: Abstracted Summaries College Self-Study Reports Approved by Dr. Allred
Continuing Education: Downtown School: School of Hotel and Restaurant
Department of Religious Activities and Student Leadership Development

scopecontent.p: This series consists of materials related to the University of Houston Self-Study done during the 1970s. It contains 3 folders and is arranged in chronological order with the original folder titles.

did.unittitle: University of Houston Central Campus Mission Self- Study Report

scopecontent.p: This series is divided into two sub-series; Principal Committee and Subject Files and consists of materials related to the University of Houston Self-Study done during the 1990s. The Principal Committee Records contains 11 folders and is arranged in alphabetical order with the original folder titles.

scopecontent.p: This series consists of materials related to the University of Houston Self-Study done during the 1990s. It contains 36 folders and is arranged in alphabetical order with the original folder titles.

scopecontent.p: This series consists of 22 files related to institutional effectiveness, 111 files listed as appendices (A-R) arranged alphabetically, and 21 files listed as miscellaneous background files which were left in original alphabetical order.
